verses.verse: Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, <S%H430><s%> God, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, <S%H5315><s%> for my soul takes refuge <S%H2620><s%> in you. <S%H6738><s%> Yes, in the shadow of your wings, <S%H3671><s%> I will take refuge, <S%H2620><s%> until disaster <S%H1942><s%> has passed. <S%H5674><s%>
I cry <S%H7121><s%> out to God <S%H430><s%> Most High, <S%H5945><s%> to God <S%H410><s%> who accomplishes my requests for me. <S%H1584><s%>

He will send <S%H7971><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> me, <S%H2778><s%> he rebukes the one who is pursuing <S%H7602><s%> me. <S%H5542><s%> Selah. God <S%H430><s%> will send out <S%H7971><s%> his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and his truth. <S%H571><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> lions. <S%H3833><s%> I lie <S%H7901><s%> among those who are set on fire, <S%H3857><s%> even the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> whose teeth <S%H8127><s%> are spears <S%H2595><s%> and arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>
Be exalted, <S%H7311><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> above the heavens! <S%H8064><s%> Let your glory <S%H3519><s%> be above all the earth! <S%H776><s%>

They have prepared <S%H3559><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> for my steps. <S%H6471><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down. <S%H3721><s%> They dig <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H7882><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me. <S%H5307><s%> They fall into its midst <S%H8432><s%> themselves. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
My heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast. <S%H3559><s%> I will sing, <S%H7891><s%> yes, <S%H2167><s%> I will sing praises.
Wake <S%H5782><s%> up, <S%H5782><s%> my glory! <S%H3519><s%> Wake <S%H5782><s%> up, <S%H5035><s%> psaltery and harp! <S%H5035><s%> I will wake up the dawn. <S%H5782><s%>
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H136><s%> Lord, among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to you among the nations. <S%H3816><s%>
For your great <S%H1419><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> reaches to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> to the skies. <S%H7834><s%>
Be exalted, <S%H7311><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> above the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> Let your glory <S%H3519><s%> be over all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
